summary: A young lonely woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.
cast: Jude Law|Norah Jones|Chad R. Davis|Katya Blumenberg|John Malloy|Demetrius Butler|Frankie Faison|David Strathairn|Adriane Lenox|Rachel Weisz|Benjamin Kanes|Cat Power|Michael Hartnett|Natalie Portman|Michael May|Jesse Garon|Sam Hill|Tracy Elizabeth Blackwell|Michael DeLano|Audrei Kairen|Bill Hollis|C. Clayton Blackwell|Hector A. Leguillow|Paula Allen|Nate Bynum|Jan Falk|Marguerite Hibbets|Ty Izquierdo|Laurie Johnson|Naseera Mays|Donald Meyers|Jackie Moore|Alisa Nave|Ben Siler|Kenon Walker|Dolores Winn
title: My Blueberry Nights
